Package Manager

Class PromoMgr

java.lang.Object
Manager.PromoMgr
public class PromoMgr extends Object
Represents the class which manages anything related to the Set Promos in the restaurant.
Since:
2021-11-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Timothy Lim

    • readPromo

      public static void readPromo​(ArrayList<SetPromo> promoList) throws FileNotFoundException
      File Reader function to read data in the Set Promo txt file and stores the values and its relative attributes in the Array List
      Parameters:
      promoList - The Array List to store attributes.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

    • createSetPromo

      public static void createSetPromo​(String setName, String setDes, int numOfFood)
      Creates a new Set Promo and adds it to the Array List.
      Parameters:
      setName - This new Set Promo's name.
      setDes - This new Set Promo's description.
      numofFood - The number of Food Item's in this new Set Promo.

    • addFood

      public static void addFood​(String foodName, String type, String setName)
      Adds a new Food Item in the specified Set Promo.
      Parameters:
      foodName - Name of Food Item to be added.
      type - Type of the new Foot Item to be added.
      setName - The name of the Set Promo to add Food Item.

    • removeFood

      public static void removeFood​(String name, String setName)
      Removes a Food Item from the Set Promo.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Food Item to be removed.
      setName - The name of the Set Promo for Food Item to be removed.

    • printPromoMenu

      public static void printPromoMenu()
      Prints the Set Promos available in the Restaurant
